Room.Name: Bendine Aquarium Main Entrance
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the Main Entrance to the Bendine Aquarium and Marina.
Room.LongDescription: The Bendine Aquarium and Marina provides a number of strange and interesting creatures for public viewing. However, visitors should be warned that although many of the creatures living in the Aquarium are friendly, some will attack you, especially if you enter the tanks where they are swimming. The hallway continues to the east.
